title: So, the girl I like has a boyfriend. What good song can I listen to that relates to my situation? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know what type of song you want. I mean- If you're sad about it then these are the songs suitable on your situation- Wish I was your lover- Enrique IglesiasHeartbreaker- Enrique IglesiasOne day at a time- Akon ft.EnriqueMain tainu yaar bhul Jana(Punjabi)- Jassi GillSomebody's me- EnriqueTrue love- PinkI can't make you love me -Bonnie RaitNow if you're happy for her you should go with these- Send my love - AdeleTear drop on my guitar- Taylor swiftAnd if you're hoping to get her to you listen to these Like I would - Zayn MalikNever gonna leave your side -Deniel BedingfieldYou belong with me - Taylor swiftSan dimas high school football rules -AtarisBoyfriend -Justin BieberHope it was helpful :)
